name: Feederz
description:
Description:
Feederz is a first-person survival horror game developed for Ludum Dare 46. The theme of the jam was: Keep it alive.

Instructions:
Feed it only when hungry. Don't die.

Story:
You are volunteer caretaker tasked with caring for the young. Keep it alive and fed, if you know what's good for you!

Tips:
Play in fullscreen for the best experience.

Controls and credits:
Can be found ingame.
